data.lyric:
[ti:Slow Dance In A Parking Lot]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Country Spring Hits]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Slow Dance In A Parking Lot - Jordan Davis
[00:08.31]Producer：Paul DiGiovanni
[00:16.62]Lights go down wheels go 'round
[00:19.24]I'm taking you home
[00:20.97]Hoping for a slow song to come on the radio now
[00:25.24]I'm not ready to shut it down
[00:27.52]The way the dashboard glow
[00:29.47]Is hitting your eyes making me lose everything on my mind
[00:33.64]And the only thing I wanna do is find a spot
[00:36.38]
[00:36.96]Stop this car and throw it in park and just
[00:40.02]Slow dance with you
[00:45.95]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[00:48.69]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[00:51.24]Getting close to you
[00:57.97]Making the most of whatever we got
[00:59.95]Even if it's just a slow dance in a parking lot
[01:03.72]
[01:04.77]Slow dance in a parking lot
[01:06.70]
[01:09.05]A half song gone one door open across the lot
[01:13.51]A rent a cop's rolling a security car
[01:16.21]It's yellow lights spinning and flashing in time
[01:19.28]To the radio singing a little Garth brooks
[01:22.10]You start humming the very last verse to she's every woman
[01:26.39]And I don't care what song comes next
[01:29.29]I'm falling right here don't want a safety net in a
[01:32.52]Slow dance with you
[01:38.67]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[01:41.10]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[01:43.97]Getting close to you
[01:50.47]Making the most of whatever we got
[01:52.63]Even if it's just a slow dance in a parking lot
[01:56.59]
[02:07.48]And get close to you
[02:13.98]Making the most of whatever we got even if it's just
[02:17.72]
[02:19.43]A slow dance with you
[02:25.59]Spinning you around by the Walmart sign
[02:27.87]And moving our feet over the painted white lines
[02:30.95]Getting close to you
[02:37.32]Making the most of whatever we got
[02:39.57]Even if it's just just a slow dance in a parking lot
data.trans:
[ti:Slow Dance In A Parking Lot]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Country Spring Hits]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.31]//
[00:16.62]灯光熄灭 车轮转动
[00:19.24]我要带你回家
[00:20.97]希望电台现在能播放一首慢歌
[00:25.24]我还没准备好结束这一切
[00:27.52]仪表板发出光芒
[00:29.47]映在你眼帘中 让我忘乎所以
[00:33.64]我只想找个地方
[00:36.38]
[00:36.96]停下车 把车扔在公园
[00:40.02]与你翩翩起舞
[00:45.95]在沃尔玛招牌旁一起转圈
[00:48.69]踩着舞步走在斑马线上
[00:51.24]靠近你
[00:57.97]充分利用现有的条件
[00:59.95]就算只能在停车场跳一段慢舞
[01:03.72]
[01:04.77]在停车场里慢舞
[01:06.70]
[01:09.05]半首歌放完 停车场对面打开了一扇门
[01:13.51]保安开着一辆巡逻车
[01:16.21]黄色的灯光有规律地旋转和闪烁
[01:19.28]收音机里放着Garth Brooks的音乐
[01:22.10]你开始哼唱《She's Every Woman》的最后一段
[01:26.39]我不在乎下一首是什么歌
[01:29.29]我彻底沦陷了 想要不顾一切地
[01:32.52]和你跳支慢舞
[01:38.67]在沃尔玛招牌旁一起转圈
[01:41.10]踩着舞步走在斑马线上
[01:43.97]慢慢靠近你
[01:50.47]充分利用现有的条件
[01:52.63]就算只能在停车场跳一段慢舞
[01:56.59]
[02:07.48]慢慢靠近你
[02:13.98]充分利用现有的条件 就算只能
[02:17.72]
[02:19.43]和你跳一段慢舞
[02:25.59]在沃尔玛招牌旁一起转圈
[02:27.87]踩着舞步走在斑马线上
[02:30.95]慢慢靠近你
[02:37.32]充分利用现有的条件
[02:39.57]就算只能在停车场跳一段慢舞
